name: Ceresmon
effect: ＜Digisorption -3＞ (When one of your Digimon digivolves into this card from your hand, you may suspend 1 of your Digimon to reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 3.)[Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When suspending Digimon for a ＜Digisorption＞ skill, you may suspend your opponent's Digimon instead.
